column1: Local Foods////My absolute favorite is the Gulf Shrimp And Blue Crab. It converted me from a hot-sandwich girl to a who-gives-a-crap-what-temperature-it-is girl. Every part of the sandwich is pure bliss. The ciabatta from Slow Dough Bread Co is so tasty it needs no assistance from other players
column2: but the other ingredients just insist. The Green Goddess dressing is not intrusive at all and the pickled red onions are a lovely sharp accompaniment to the whole thing. The shrimp and blue crab don't hide. Local Foods is generous with their meat. You would swear that there is a hint of butter in there somewhere; that is what makes you close your eyes at the end of each bite
